name: @elitan/luma
description: Zero-downtime deployments for your own servers.
author: Elitan

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --access public
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --tag alpha --access public
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.release:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --tag rc --access public
